page.title: 06J.C.B 2
page.content: The company which started by producing farm trailers,moved into a small cheese factory in Rocester in 1952.The factory today covers 1,250,000 sq.ft.The earth around had to be excavated to a depth of 40ft.The lower part of the building is made of concrete or brick,the upper part of corragated sheet metal painted green to match in with the countryside.There is a helicopter landing pad where prospective customers are brought from the nearest airport to view and inspect the products.It overlooks beautiful landscaped grounds and 3 lakes which are used by employees for recreation.
